game.name: Project II: Silent Valley
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Project II: Silent Valley is a linear, semi-open world dystopian visual novel with card combat and explore. Play as US Navy Officer Hierophan, joining the docile humanoid weapon Osprey to uncover a conspiracy at the underwater base "Silent Valley" and the hidden truths of his missing friend, Ochira.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Project II: Silent Valley is a linear, semi-open world dystopian visual novel with card combat and explore. Play as US Navy Officer Hierophan, joining the docile humanoid weapon Osprey to uncover a conspiracy at the underwater base "Silent Valley" and the hidden truths of his missing friend, Ochira.
